name: Rings (TinyBookshelf)
description:
Rings is a timing-based puzzle game.

... maybe a little luck-based, too. 

Try to clear each level by hitting the target before you run out of shots. But beware: There are barriers in your way, and they can be tricky.

What's your high score? Can you clear all ten levels?

A free web game by Tiny Bookshelf (follow @Tiny_Bookshelf on Twitter).

Enjoy!



Known bug: Sometimes the GAME OVER text pops up prematurely? Haven't figured it out yet, will update if I do. You can keep playing 'underneath' it or hit X to restart, so it's not game-breaking anyway.
